dc_description_s: This layer shows the district level data for general land use and cropped area 1985-86 and 1987-88.  The source of the data is the seventy-fourth issue of the Indian Agricultural Statistics, volume II - district-wise. This is a publication of the Directorate of Economics and Statistics, Department of Agriculture and Cooperation, Ministry of Agriculture; Government of India. This is for the period between 1985-86 to 1987-88.
